description: Calculate inclination of subsea structures using DigiQuartz depth sensors. Supports 4-point baseline and best-fit plane methods.
author: Fathom OS
features: DigiQuartz NPD file parsing with auto-detection
Pressure unit conversion (mbar, bar, kPa, dbar, PSI, atm)
CertificateStatement: This is to certify that the inclination analysis of the specified subsea structure has been successfully completed using validated depth measurement processing algorithms and industry-standard calculation methods.
